trans-unit.source: Represents the AudienceRestriction element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.5.1.4].
If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is empty, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown during serialization.
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class with no Audience elements.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> property is initialized to an empty collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class with the specified URIs.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is initialized using the elements of the specified collection.
The collection of <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that contains the Audience elements contained in this restriction.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction.Audiences%2A> collection is initialized with the specified Audience element.
A <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that represents the contents of the Audience element contained in this restriction.
Gets a collection of URIs that specifies the audiences to which the assertion is addressed.
The condition is valid if the relying party is a member of any of the specified audiences.
The Audience elements contained by the AudienceRestriction element.
A collection of type <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> that specifies the audiences.
